snippet: FISHMAN--Barry, age 57, died May 9 in Beaverton, OR. Survived by Bryan Kellogg, Charles, Nancy, Alexa and Kimberly Fishman. He was a retail business analyst at Columbia Sportswear. Beloved by all who knew him, he has left us far too soon. Funeral May 15, at 10am at the Edwards-Dowdle Funeral Home, Dobbs Ferry. 1/3
lead_paragraph: FISHMAN--Barry, age 57, died May 9 in Beaverton, OR. Survived by Bryan Kellogg, Charles, Nancy, Alexa and Kimberly Fishman. He was a retail business analyst at Columbia Sportswear. Beloved by all who knew him, he has left us far too soon. Funeral May 15, at 10am at the Edwards-Dowdle Funeral Home, Dobbs Ferry. 1/3
